Pink Panda
The future of finance

Pink Panda is a winning Utility token, powering the development of next-gen crypto finance tools, 5x Leverage DeX for BSC. $PINKPANDA Cares deeply about community and giving back. A portion of $PINKPANDA tokens has been set aside for charity.

Buy Now
Join Telegram
What we're Building
non-custodial, fully on-chain, mobile-first decentralized exchange
Supporting up to 5x leverage
Community Voting
Safu Tools To Make Rugpulling A Thing Of The Past
Large Portion Of All Our Profits Will Go To Charity
Open Whitepaper (PDF)
Tokenomics
1,000,000,000,000,000 Token Supply
50% Burned
10% Transaction Tax
5% - Locked into Liquidity Pool
5%- Airdropped to token holders
5% Dev Wallet
5% Charity & Marketing Wallet
20% Token Presale
20% Token Initial Liquidity
Read Our Audit (Pdf)
WHY PINKPANDA
Add PINK PANDAS to your feed to be your daily dose of positivity. Pink Pandas are the ultimate community of positive thinkers, future doers, and change-makers. We all want to make the world a better place.
We’re a global community of driven individuals thriving to make the world a better place. We are a community of discussion and encouragement, collaboration and connection. We empower each other to imagine and create new realities.

PinkPanda Cares

At PinkPanda we care about giving back to the community and the broader world. We aspire to build a company that takes into account more than just shareholder profit. In line with this we have our first donation of $1000 to the American Cancer Society. This is the first of many and an issue that has impacted our founder Adam Carlton’s life significantly after he lost his mother & best friend to cancer. In the future we will be building the functionality to allow all $PINKPANDA holders to have a vote in which causes we support. In the meantime enjoy this video of Adam making the first donation (next time we will give him a cup of coffee before he donates).

MEET THE FOUNDER
Adam Carlton

I’m Adam, the proudly doxxed founder of PinkPanda Finance. I’ve been on the cutting-edge of tech and business for over 20 years in a variety of consulting, executive, and entrepreneurial roles. I see two opportunities here with massive potential: a powerful margin-enabled DEX on BSC, and harnessing community-coins for charitable causes. With PinkPanda, we’re killing two birds with one stone.

I think most of us have been touched by cancer at some point in our lives. For myself, losing my best friend when he was 30 had a profound effect on my life, and then more recently my mother passed from pancreatic cancer in 2019. I swore to myself two years ago that I would take my life experiences in business and technology and never again devote myself to something that wasn’t harnessing the power of community, charity, and positivity.

So I rounded up some of the best crypto developers and marketers in the world, and through many sleepless nights we put together the concept of PinkPanda Finance. We wanted a truly revolutionary coin that not only rewards its adopters, but brings together the best of cryptocurrency. It is unruggable, yield-generating, brings cutting edge trading concepts pioneered in other chains to BSC, and brings rewards to a highly participatory community that chooses to engage in something positive.

 
Adam Carlton
Founder and Community Builder
Linkedin

FAQS

What is $PINKPANDA?

$PINKPANDA is a revolutionary new currency on the Binance Smart Chain. Think of $PINKPANDA as a fair universal currency for the people. This is real project that will constantly be evolving. And that begins with linking impact directly to economic growth, and propelling the DeFi ecosystem to a new level. Join the revolution!

What are the tokenomics?

We charge 10% of every transaction with 5% going towards the liquidity pool, and 5% redistributed to holders to reward investors and keep the charity wallet flowing. $PINKPANDA has an initial 5% charity wallet for donations, and a 5% dev wallet for project financing (keep in mind we are building a highly complex application). 1,000,000,000,000,000 initial supply. 50% of tokens to be burned.

Which organizations do you donate to?

We are working with several charities that have set up wallets we can send crypto payments to! In addition to this, we are in the process of creating a larger list of charity organizations that accept cryptocurrency and will launch community voting through our app. Our goal is for the community to decide which causes matter most them.

The first amount we are donating is $1,000, followed by $10,000. We are looking to donate a minimum of 1,000,000 by this time next year. Get involved and help us make this a reality!

What is the contract address?

Our contract is 0x631e1e455019c359b939fe214edc761d36bf6ad6

Any other token claiming to be PinkPanda is a scam. You can see our contract here:  https://bscscan.com/address/0x631e1e455019c359b939fe214edc761d36bf6ad6#code

How can I buy $PINKPANDA?

You can buy $PINKPANDA on Pancakeswap. Our contract address is: 0x631e1e455019c359b939fe214edc761d36bf6ad6
You can find a quick video tutorial here

I want to suggest a charity!

Send us a DM and stay tuned for the app to come out, where you will be able to submit and vote on charities that you care about!

How come people say this project is un-ruggable?

Because we have renounced ownership of the contract and locked the funds in the liquidity pool, the token is rug-proof because it has no owner. It will exist forever on BSC, unaltered. So rest easy, knowing that funds are very very safu.

I'm having issues buying on Pancake Swap, Help!

If you have pancake swap errors 

 1. Set slippage to 11-13%

 2. Delete the last 0 on the amount of $PINKPANDA your buying and re add it

 3. Make sure you set Gwei to at least 10 (BSC is generally congested)

 4. Make the amount of $PINKPANDA you’re buying to all even numbers.
